query: query($login:String!){ user(login:$login){ contributionsCollection{ totalCommitContributions restrictedContributionsCount totalPullRequestContributions totalIssueContributions contributionCalendar{ totalContributions } } pullRequests{ totalCount } issues{ totalCount } repositories(privacy: PUBLIC){ totalCount } issueComments{ totalCount } pullRequestReviewComments{ totalCount } } }
